question: The vending machines sell popcorn for 40 cents and crackers for 50 cents. Chris spent $12 and got 6 bags of popcorn and had 5% of his money left in change. How many crackers did he buy?
answer:
Chris got $0.6 in change because $12*5/100 = <<12*5/100=0.6>>0.6
Chris spent $11.4 because 12 - 0.6 = <<12-0.6=11.4>>11.4
Chris spent $2.4 on popcorn because 6*0.4 = <<6*0.4=2.4>>2.4
Chris spent 9 on crackers because 11.4 - 2.4 = <<11.4-2.4=9>>9
Chris bought 18 crackers because 9 / 0.5 = <<18=18>>18
#### 18
